item.title: She wanted to keep her son in his school district. It was more challenging than it seemed
item.description: When families are evicted, kidsâ€™ schooling is often disrupted. Many evicted families go from living in a school district that spends more money on students to one that spends less.

item.title: Epstein emails reveal enduring ties with influential figures even after his sex crime conviction
Latest opioid settlement plan with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler family getting few objections
